freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate: <#list rows as row> <#assign intermediateRegionName>${row["Intermediate Region Name"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign intermediateRegionId>${intermediateRegionName?lower_case?replace(' ','_')?replace('-','_')}</#assign> <#assign m49Code>${row["Intermediate Region Code"]?trim}</#assign> create custom-table-row who_intermediate_region "${intermediateRegionId}" custom-table-row who_intermediate_region "${intermediateRegionId}" set field display_name "${intermediateRegionName}" set field m49_code "${m49Code}" exit </#list>
